title: Mobile Microlearning Course for Instructional Design (ID)-Driven Educational Improvement

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: A course for corporate HRD managers or team leaders emphasizing practical application of instructional design theories in real work environments

learning_goals: Learners can draft an educational program by applying a five-stage instructional design model, including learner analysis, goal setting, and assessment design.
Learners can diagnose issues in existing curricula and propose improvements using the ADDIE model.
Learners can independently produce three or more mobile-optimized microlearning contents (5-minute duration).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
